data.name: Banana Drama
data.detailed_description:
Oh no! A bunch of dinosaurs are doing mischief on the island and are holding the monkey king captive. Free the king, be the king!
Build your monkey village and collect resources to prepare for the ultimate island fight. But be aware - there may be other monkey armies, too.
Invite your friends to an awesome online session or enhance your banana drama skills in singleplayer mode. The island is waiting for you!

Quick Features

  • Singleplayer
  • Online multiplayer
  • Tricky bots
  • Lovely graphics
  • Multiple play modes
  • Independent developers
  • Free!

Overview

Banana Drama is an independent early access RTS game with a singleplayer and online multiplayer experience. Collect resources, build your village and free your monkey king. Find the perfect strategy to prepare your monkey army. But do not wait too long, your opponents aren't sleeping! :o

Singleplayer

You like to play solo? If you manage to free the king, you win. If all your monkeys are defeated, victory goes to the dinosaurs. In this mode you have no time pressure and therefore it can be used as a great training mode for a turbulent multiplayer game. Turn on some bots for the ultimate island fight.

Multiplayer

Fight your (real) opponents and be the last survivor. The last one standing wins the game! The monkey king plays a central role, too. If you free him, he will join your army.

Monkey King

The monkey king has decisive advantages: he collects resources way faster than normal monkeys and has so much more health points. It might be advantageous to free him fast! But oh no - be aware! The dinos have other plans :/

Monkeys

Hugo, Bernadette, Alfred, Herbert and so many more! Your loyal monkeys are waiting for you! What are you waiting for?

data.short_description: Banana Drama is a free & independent early access RTS game offering a singleplayer and online multiplayer experience. Your monkey king is held captive by evil dinos - he needs help! Get free early access and be part of the banana crew. Please consider giving us feedback on Discord :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable internet connection required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that is able to play sounds
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable high speed internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Catalina or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable internet connection required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Catalina or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that is able to play sounds
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable high speed internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04.4 & Fedora (might work on other versions, too)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable internet connection required. Steamdeck currently not supported.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04.4 & Fedora (might work on other versions, too)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that is able to play sounds
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable high speed internet connection. Steamdeck currently not supported.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes that may be perceived as violent.
